## R Markdown

1. Create in GitHub new repo
2. Create new project in R-Studio (Version-Control)
3 Choose Git-Tab in the Enviroment-Window and click on the Elements
4 Click "Commit"
5 Make Comments 
6 Click the Push-Button

```{r cars}
summary(cars)
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
